main event: A group of basketball-size, orange lights were spotted which coasted with strange zigzag motion down the sky. One object appeared to explode over Sweetwater.
interesting points: The objects were described as very large, about 2 times the size of a basketball at arm's length.
The objects were coated with an orange flame down the sides.
The objects had a ball of fire in the front and back, appearing to be two little balls of fire.
The objects moved in an erratic, zigzag pattern across the sky.
One of the objects appeared to explode over the town of Sweetwater.
sighted object: group of basketball-size, orange lights with erratic movement
photographs: yes, the report indicates photos were taken
